https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vOiUu6VyR7fU9gMxbWg5AmKFaPO.jpg Short film made entirely by a picketer from Lanús that gives a first-person account of a land occupation carried out by the Unemployed Workers Movement in March 2002. Its author asked to borrow a camera for an hour to film his neighborhood and its history. Compañero cineasta piquetero
